text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trumpnokio is a dumbass! The FDA has warned against the use of hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine to treat the novel coronavirus and said they should only be used in hospitals or clinical trials because they can kill or cause serious side effects
